name: weather_risk_analysis_agent
description: An agent that analyzes weather alerts to identify vulnerable populations and high-risk areas using census demographics and historical flood data from BigQuery.

skills.name: Analyze Alert Impact
skills.description: Assess the impact of weather alerts on vulnerable populations including elderly, low-income, and flood-prone areas.

skills.name: Calculate Risk Scores
skills.description: Generate risk scores (0-10) for affected areas based on population demographics and historical disaster data.

skills.name: Query Demographics
skills.description: Retrieve census demographic data including population, age distribution, and income levels.

skills.name: Query Flood History
skills.description: Access historical flood event data to identify high-risk areas.
